channel.title: Non-mathematical posts on Exploring mathematics
channel.description: Recent content in Non-mathematical posts on Exploring mathematics

item.title: Hello Blog!
item.description: Hello blog! This blog is the start of a new adventure. This may sound a bit overromantic, but I mean that I am looking forward to writing more. Earlier I enjoyed writing a lot, but as I got older and fell into more and more mathematics and responsibilty and got less time, writing up ideas and things I learned felt more like work than fun. I hope this blog may contribute to a change.
